title: Frederick Douglass National Historic Site: Lesson Plans
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Lesson Plans              Lesson Plans       Teaching with Historic Places  Journey from Slavery to Statesman: The Homes of Frederick Douglass (link to the National Register of Historic Places website)   Â    Teaching with Museum Collections  Frederick Douglass' Hat (PDF, 155 KB) Forward March: Continuing Frederick Douglass' Footsteps (PDF, 277 KB) From Slavery to Freedom: Different Journeys to Liberty   These lesson plans were developed through the National Park Service's Museum Management Program. Educators should use them in conjunction with the program's virtual museum exhibit on Frederick Douglass. Additional information, tips on how to "read" objects, and lesson plans for other National Park Service sites can be found on the Teaching with Museum Collections website.
